## About Me
My name is *Allison Bubar*. I go to Newton North High School. My interests include basketball, and volleyball.

## About the Project
My project, *NNHS Women's Basketball 2022/23 Evaluation*, draws correlations between statistical categories and success for the team.

### Goals
  + honestly evaluate my team in a way that could help future growth
  + provide data that explores the roots of what helps the team be successful
  + create a theoretical system that could help the team be successful.
